subject: re:Special offer
body:
Dear valued member.
Take advantage of MyCanadianPharmacy's special half-price offer and buy your drugs at lowest Internet prices.
MyCanadianPharmacy offers high quality Canadian products meeting all Pharmaceutical Standards. Wide selection of products which are cheaper than American ones are available to order online. Easy, secure and confidential ordering process.
Save your money with one mouse click. http://largefun.hk
Sincerely yours,Russ Gillis
